explains: adv. 故意地；机警地，狡黠地

sentences.en: He repeated that he had never knowingly taken illegal drugs.
sentences.cn: 他反复说自己从未故意吸毒。

sentences.en: She was accused of knowingly making a false statement to the police.
sentences.cn: 她被指控故意向警方提供虚假供词。

sentences.en: The company has consistently denied it had knowingly broken arms embargoes.
sentences.cn: 该公司始终否认故意违反了武器禁运规定。
